fileProgram

Class FileActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • fileProgram.FileActions

  • public class FileActions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will do all the actions that have anything to do with accesing or writing a file
    Author:
    Ylva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.io.File readFile
      This is the object from which to read
      private static java.util.Scanner readStream
      The read stream, has to be opened
      private static java.io.File writeFile
      This is the object from which to write
      private static java.io.PrintWriter writeStream
      This is the write stream

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileActions()
      Default constructor, sets the file default files

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeReadStream()
      This will close the input stream, should always be run after you are done reading the file
      static void closeWriteStream()
      Will close the write stream, should always be done when you are ready with the file

      static java.io.File getReadFile() 
      static java.io.File getWriteFile() 
      static boolean hasNextInt()
      Will check if the stream has an int value as next token, Should only be run if the hasNextLine() method returns true

      Will check if there is another line in the stream
      static void openReadStream()
      Will open the stream, should only be run if fileExcists() returns true
      static void openWriteStream() 
      static int readInt()
      Will read an int from the input stream and return that Hint, make sure that there is an int type next in the stream with the hasNextInt method
      static void setReadFile(java.io.File readFile)
      Sets the file to be read
      static void setReadFile(java.lang.String fileLocation)
      Sets the location of the file from which you need to read
      static void setWriteFile(java.io.File writeFile)
      Sets the file to which needs to be written
      static void setWriteFile(java.lang.String fileLocation)
      Sets the location of the file to which you want to write
      static void writeInt(int toWrite)
      Will write an int to the write stream, and then end the line

      • readInt

        public static int readInt()
        Will read an int from the input stream and return that Hint, make sure that there is an int type next in the stream with the hasNextInt method
        Returns:
        the next int on the input stream

      • hasNextLine

        public static boolean hasNextLine()
        Will check if there is another line in the stream
        Returns:
        true if there is another line in the stream

      • hasNextInt

        public static boolean hasNextInt()
        Will check if the stream has an int value as next token, Should only be run if the hasNextLine() method returns true
        Returns:
        true if the next token is an int

      • writeInt

        public static void writeInt(int toWrite)
        Will write an int to the write stream, and then end the line
        Parameters:
        toWrite - the int to write
